name: Zombie and a Pogo
description:
What the heck, Zombie and a Pogo? Try to keep your head intact and keep on moving through numerous obstacles, pitfalls and all sorts of trouble as you try to make it as far as you can!

Zombie and a Pogo features:
• Endless world, Physics rules, Deadly pitfalls.
• Bone breaking crashes and knockouts!
• Pick up and play. No brains required!
• The farther you get, the crazier the course!
